sentences.en: A little bracing roughness is better than spoiling him.
sentences.cn: 令人精神振作的微弱粗暴比娇宠他要好得多.

sentences.en: But Israel had been bracing itself for some form of retaliation.
sentences.cn: 不过以色列已经为某种形式的报复做好了准备.

sentences.en: Credit card companies are bracing for record losses.
sentences.cn: 信用卡公司正在亏损中苦苦支撑.

sentences.en: Do you use the Torres bracing pattern?
sentences.cn: 你使用托雷士吉他的扇形力木系统 吗 ?

sentences.en: Each case of bracing can be unique in its design.
sentences.cn: 每个补强件在其设计中可以是唯一的.

sentences.en: Generation II USA , Inc. - osteoarthritis bracing.
He was grateful to the girl for this Bracing sensation of independence.
sentences.cn: 他感激那位姑娘使他产生这种令人振奋的独立不羁的感觉.

sentences.en: I love this bracing sea air!
sentences.cn: 我喜爱这种令人精神振奋的海上空气!

sentences.en: Other gear makers are bracing for a difficult year.
sentences.cn: 其他电信设备生产商今年的日子也不好过.

sentences.en: Personnel access through mid rails and cross bracing is not recommended.
sentences.cn: 不提倡人员通过中间隔档和拉条进入.

sentences.en: Scarlett obeyed, bracing herself and catching firm hold of one of the bedposts.
sentences.cn: 思嘉照她的吩咐, 紧紧抓住一根床柱,站稳了身子.

sentences.en: The air blowing on the brow was fresh, sweet and bracing.
sentences.cn: 崖顶的风儿清新, 沁脾,教人振奋.

sentences.en: The bracing winter chill can wake up anyone.
sentences.cn: 刺骨的冬寒让每个人保持清醒.

sentences.en: The full diagonal bracing is the most economical type of wind bracing.
sentences.cn: 最经济的抗风支撑形式是完全对角支撑.

sentences.en: Transverse bracing was installed between the two shafts.
sentences.cn: 两根立柱之间设置了横撑.

words.tran_cn: 支柱；[语] 大括号；曲柄
支撑；使绷紧；做好准备；激励（brace的过去分词）
支撑；振作起来；激励；撑牢

phrases.tran_cn: 支撑结构；横向支撑结构

trans.tran_cn: 令人振奋的，使人心旷神怡的
trans.tran_en: bracing air or weather is cold and makes you feel very awake and healthy

trans.tran_cn: 支住( brace的现在分词 )，撑牢，使自己站稳，振作起来
